name: Statics
notes: Fundamental concepts of mechanics such as free body diagrams, center of gravity, inertia, and equilibrium.

name: Business Writing
notes: Basics of business writing while reviewing the various kinds of written business correspondence.

name: Dynamics
notes: Reviews dynamics of particles and rigid bodies using free body diagrams, Newton's laws, impulse-momentum, and energy methods.

name: Engineering Economics Analysis
notes: Application of engineering economics principles to equipment acquisition and system feasibility analysis.

name: Senior Design 2 and Lab
notes: Project planning and evaluation of an engineering problem.

name: Senior Design 1
notes: Covers statements of work, milestones, scheduling, and resource allocation.

name: Engineering, Technology, and Calculus 1
notes: Precalculus and calculus concepts applied to engineering problem solving.
